most_active_tickets.title: Discord link provided is invalid on the website
Discord link provided is invalid in Pieces OS
Sublime Text plugin icon is bogus

common_issues.title: Invalid Discord Link and Incorrect Sublime Icon
common_issues.description: Users report invalid Discord invite links on the Pieces website, documentation, and Pieces OS.  A separate issue reports an incorrect icon for the Sublime Text plugin in the Connected Applications menu, which should display the Sublime Text 4 icon instead of the Pieces icon.

related_issues.title: Discord link provided is invalid on the website
related_issues.text:
Discord link provided is invalid on the website
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Marketing Site (pieces.app)

### Operating System / Platform

Web

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.4.2

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

The main Pieces website [page](<https://pieces.app>) offers the following Discord invite link: <https://discord.gg/getpieces>

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/106f7b8e-0f74-4efa-a6ec-9cfe48133198)

The support [page](<https://docs.pieces.app/products/support>) of Pieces documentation website offers the following Discord invite link: <https://discord.com/invite/getpieces>

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/87064aff-9a18-420f-bb9f-a86e358e3dea)

Both of the above Discord invite links are invalid. You should create one without an expiration date and replace all those.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: Discord link provided is invalid in Pieces OS
related_issues.text:
Discord link provided is invalid in Pieces OS
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.4.2

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Pieces OS app offers the following Discord invite link: <https://discord.gg/ubn8JFAXQ7>

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/894385e1-db70-49fc-8f48-f5abafadeac0)

The above Discord invite link is invalid. You should create one without an expiration date and replace it.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: Sublime Text plugin icon is bogus
related_issues.text:
Sublime Text plugin icon is bogus
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.4.2

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

The Connected Applications menu in Settings uses Pieces icon for Sublime Plugin.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/6a6d4db1-3767-43cf-a15a-d16a88a0e9a2)

It should be using the Sublime Text 4 icon, since that is what you have published the plugin for.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Verify and update all Discord invite links across the Pieces website, documentation, and Pieces OS to ensure they are valid and do not expire.
Replace the Pieces icon with the Sublime Text 4 icon for the Sublime Text plugin in the Connected Applications menu.
Investigate the root cause of the invalid Discord link issue and implement measures to prevent similar issues in the future.
Prioritize resolving the open tickets related to the Discord link and Sublime Text icon.
Monitor incoming support tickets for recurring issues and identify areas for improvement in the product or documentation.
Consider adding a troubleshooting section to the documentation or FAQ for common issues like invalid links or incorrect icons.
Implement a system for tracking and managing known issues to ensure timely resolution and communication with users.
Regularly review and update the support documentation to reflect the latest product changes and address user feedback.
Collect user feedback on the support experience and identify areas for improvement in the process or communication.
Provide training to support staff on common issues and best practices for resolving tickets efficiently and effectively.
Explore options for automating certain support tasks, such as ticket routing or initial responses.
Analyze support ticket data to identify trends and patterns that can inform product development and improve user experience.
Establish service level agreements (SLAs) for ticket response and resolution times to manage user expectations and ensure timely support.
Communicate proactively with users about known issues and planned maintenance to minimize disruption and improve transparency.
Encourage users to submit bug reports and feature requests through a dedicated channel to improve product quality and user satisfaction.
Implement a system for prioritizing support tickets based on severity and impact to ensure critical issues are addressed first.
Regularly review and update the support knowledge base with solutions to common issues and best practices.
Provide support staff with access to the necessary tools and resources to diagnose and resolve issues effectively.
Foster a culture of continuous improvement in the support team by encouraging feedback and implementing best practices.
Measure and track key support metrics, such as ticket resolution time and customer satisfaction, to monitor performance and identify areas for improvement.
Consider implementing a customer support platform or help desk software to streamline support operations and improve efficiency.
Integrate the support system with other tools, such as the bug tracking system or product development platform, to improve collaboration and communication.
Provide support staff with regular training on new product features and updates to ensure they are equipped to handle user inquiries effectively.
Develop a clear escalation path for complex or critical issues to ensure they are handled by the appropriate team members.
Encourage users to provide feedback on the support experience through surveys or feedback forms to identify areas for improvement.
Analyze support ticket data to identify common user pain points and inform product development decisions.
Proactively identify and address potential support issues before they impact a large number of users.
Regularly review and update the support processes and procedures to ensure they are aligned with best practices and industry standards.
Communicate clearly and effectively with users throughout the support process to manage expectations and build trust.
Empower support staff to make decisions and resolve issues independently to improve efficiency and customer satisfaction.
Foster a positive and supportive work environment for the support team to promote morale and improve performance.
Continuously evaluate and improve the support operations to ensure they are meeting the needs of the users and the business.
Use data and analytics to drive decision-making and optimize support processes for maximum efficiency and effectiveness.
Stay up-to-date on industry trends and best practices in customer support to ensure the team is providing the best possible service.
Collaborate with other teams, such as product development and marketing, to ensure a consistent and positive user experience across all touchpoints.
Regularly review and update the support strategy to ensure it is aligned with the overall business goals and objectives.
Invest in the development and training of support staff to ensure they have the skills and knowledge necessary to provide excellent customer service.
Build a strong relationship with the user community by actively engaging with users and addressing their feedback.
Create a self-service knowledge base or FAQ section to empower users to find solutions to common issues on their own.
Offer multiple support channels, such as email, phone, and chat, to cater to different user preferences.
Personalize the support experience by addressing users by name and tailoring the communication to their specific needs.
Follow up with users after resolving a ticket to ensure they are satisfied with the solution and to gather feedback on the support experience.
Use customer support metrics to track progress and measure the success of the support operations.
Continuously seek feedback from users and the support team to identify areas for improvement and innovation in the support process.
Strive to exceed user expectations by providing exceptional customer service and building strong relationships with the user community.
Promote a culture of customer-centricity within the organization to ensure that user needs are always prioritized.
Recognize and reward outstanding performance within the support team to motivate and retain top talent.
Celebrate successes and learn from failures to continuously improve the support operations and provide the best possible user experience.
View customer support as an investment in user satisfaction and loyalty, which can lead to increased customer lifetime value and business growth.
Embrace new technologies and tools to enhance the support experience and improve efficiency.
Continuously adapt and evolve the support operations to meet the changing needs of the users and the business.
Focus on providing proactive and preventative support to minimize user issues and improve overall satisfaction.
Build a strong community of users who can support each other and share knowledge and best practices.
Empower users to become advocates for the product by providing them with the resources and support they need to succeed.
View customer support as an opportunity to build relationships and create positive experiences for users.
Strive to create a seamless and integrated support experience that is consistent across all channels and touchpoints.
Use data and analytics to understand user behavior and identify opportunities to improve the product and the support experience.
Continuously innovate and experiment with new approaches to customer support to find the best solutions for the users and the business.
Focus on providing value to users through exceptional customer support and building long-term relationships.
Create a culture of continuous learning and improvement within the support team to ensure they are always providing the best possible service.
Empower the support team to be proactive and take ownership of user issues to ensure timely and effective resolution.
Build a strong partnership between the support team and other teams within the organization to ensure a seamless and integrated user experience.
View customer support as a strategic function that can contribute to the overall success of the business.
Invest in the development of a robust and scalable support infrastructure to meet the growing needs of the user base.
Continuously monitor and evaluate the performance of the support operations to identify areas for improvement and optimization.
Use data and analytics to measure the impact of support on user satisfaction, retention, and other key business metrics.
Strive to create a world-class customer support organization that is recognized for its excellence and innovation.
Focus on providing personalized, proactive, and efficient support that exceeds user expectations and builds loyalty.
Empower the support team to be ambassadors for the product and the brand, creating positive experiences for users at every interaction.
Build a strong community of users who are passionate about the product and actively contribute to its success.
View customer support as an essential part of the user experience and a key driver of business growth and success.
Continuously seek feedback from users and the support team to identify opportunities to improve and innovate the support process.
Strive to create a support experience that is so exceptional that it becomes a competitive advantage for the business.
